mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_user_level_config (`user_id`,`user_level_id`,`business_type_id`,`business_id`) SELECT #{userId},#{userLevel},2,id FROM sys_res_level_cfg WHERE user_group_type=#{userGroupType} AND version=#{version}

INSERT INTO sys_user_level_config (`user_id`,`user_level_id`,`business_type_id`,`business_id`) SELECT #{userId},#{userLevel},1,id FROM sys_dictionary WHERE type = "deviceLimit" AND valuekey = "${mobileLimitKey}" UNION SELECT #{userId},#{userLevel},1,id FROM sys_dictionary WHERE type = "deviceLimit" AND valuekey = "${pcLimitKey}"
mapper.select: select sd.* from sys_user_level_config as ul LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary as sd on(ul.business_id = sd.id) where ul.business_type_id = 1 and sd.type = "deviceLimit" and ul.user_id = #{userId} and sd.valuekey like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{valuekey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
